metadata.title: CVE-2024-1488 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Unbound due to incorrect default permissions,allowing any process outside the unbound group to modify the unboundruntime configuration. If a process can connect over localhost to port8953, it can alter the configuration of unbound.service. This flaw allowsan unprivileged attacker to manipulate a running instance, potentiallyaltering forwarders, allowing them to track all queries forwarded by thelocal resolver, and, in some cases, disrupting resolving altogether.

criterions.comment: unbound: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
